Instruction: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius) and grease a 9-inch round cake pan.

Combine flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, and baking soda in a large bowl. Use a pastry cutter to mix butter into the flour until well combined, then add raisins. In a separate bowl, whisk together buttermilk and eggs, then combine with the dry ingredients. Transfer the dough to the greased cake pan.

Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and grease a 9-inch cake pan. In a large bowl, mix together flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, and baking soda. Cut butter into the mixture until well combined, then add raisins. In a separate bowl, whisk together buttermilk and eggs; combine with the flour mixture. Transfer the dough to the cake pan. Bake until golden brown and fully cooked, about 45 minutes to 1 hour. Let cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then enjoy warm.
